item.title: Portfolio
item.description: This page shows off a couple of my projects I’m proud of and like to show off. For more of my (mostly unremarkable) projects, see my GitHub profile or my self-hosted Forgejo instance. Empede Link to heading Empede is a web client for MPD (Music Player Daemon). It was written in Rust, HTML, CSS and JavaScript, using actix-web for the back-end, askama for template rendering and the htmx front-end framework.

item.title: Résumé
item.description: For a more detailed résumé, including additional personal information and references, please contact me through one of the methods listed on the home page. Jump to: Experience • Volunteer Work • Education Experience Link to heading Aug 2021 – Jan 2024 (2 yrs 6 mos) Software Engineer  •  Health Cloud Initiative During my time at Health Cloud Initiative, I worked in a team on the electronic health record (EHR) Incura. I primarily used C# (both .
